reasoning: Birth incidence of craniosynostosis (non-syndromic and syndromic combined) approximately 1 in 2000 live births, or ~50 per 100,000 live births. Reported as incidence at birth. Non-syndromic forms account for ~80% of cases, syndromic forms ~20%.
source: Cohen MM Jr. (1992). The Child with Multiple Birth Defects. Oxford University Press, 2nd edition. Citing epidemiological compilations of birth defect registries.
